message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle on $105?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm getting close to your price, Bob! I'm willing to go a bit further. How about we meet at $102?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $98. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm really close to your price, Bob! I'm willing to go a bit further. How about we meet at $100?
